value:
Chon'sin, my homeland, has many
volcanoes. Flames erupt from their
peaks, and the land is blanketed in ash.

The hearts of my people are strong.
So long as my sister, Say'ri, lives...
Chon'sin will one day recover.

Ah, curse it! I fell asleep. I'd meant
to be meditating.

Meditation is meant to unify one's
spirit and allow contemplation of
movement in the stillness.

Some quandaries in this world
have no proper answer...

I am Yen'fay. My heart was saved
by $Nf...

I'll not say the path I chose was one
of justice. Only that I have my own
battles to fight, same as any other.

My opponents will not be able to see
through my swordsmanship.

Hm. I still have more room
to improve...
You have my thanks.

My name is Yen'fay. I was once called
Blade Legend... Now I wish only to be
a lone warrior. Nothing more.

I'm grateful you gave me a place and
a reason to fight... For I am a man
who's become no more than a blade.$k$pI lost my parents to conquerors. I
could have cast all aside and resisted,
but I chose to do the opposite.$k$pI know the truth of who I am. Call me
king or Blade Legend... I still have no
homeland. No people to call my own.$k$pSo I put such matters behind me.
Now I simply wield my blade and slay
my foes. It's the only reason I live.$k$pI am The Demon's Edge, walking a
path of carnage! I offer up my blade
to you, $Nu!
はあっ
失せよ
ぐっ…
不覚…
Hesitation brings death.
I will not ask for forgiveness.
Steel yourself!
This is where you cease.
Well fought...
ふ…
I am Yen'fay of Chon'sin. That is all you need to know.
Think twice the next time you are about to prod a man armed with a sword.
I have reasons for fighting, but that is not cause to explain them to strangers.
Say'ri? She is a rebel and traitor to the empire. I have no sister.
My homeland... It is a place of beauty, with a culture all its own.
You have found strong comrades, Say'ri...
We all walk our own paths. Do not try to stray into mine.
Aye.
At once.
Into the fray.
